short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick launch for Friv5Online.com website and games.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Friv5Online is an extension that gives you quick access to the largest collection of online games, among which there also will be Friv, which are updated on everyday basis. All the online games that you are fond of playing are now available through the Chrome extension.

Every game that you like to play at Friv5Online are now available via an extension in your browser. You can enjoy them online for free with your friends right in your browser or play with new online players across the world. We have hundreds of thousands of everyday players, and you will obviously find someone to have fun with at any time you have such a desire.
